resources.string: Es Forum - Thema erschtelle, für Lüt wo din Bitrag wänd kommentiere
Isch er aktiviert, wird de Bitrag i dim Blog ufgelischtet. Wänn nöd, wird er i dine Entwürf, privat blibe

plurals.name: publishedNbBlogPosts
plurals.comment:
%s is the number of blog posts published.
Appears in a player's activity feed after they write and publish a blog post. This notice is on the 'Activity' tab of the player who wrote the post.

resources.string: No kei Biträg i dem Blog.
Lad für din Bitrag es Bild ufe

string.name: imageAlt
string.comment: You can add alternative text (or 'alt text') to describe an image in words, for the benefit of partially sighted or blind users.

string.name: imageCredit
string.comment: A field in case the image is not yours, so you can note/give credit to the person who took the photo for example, or other forms of copyright.

string.name: safeToUseImages
string.comment:
safeToUseImages
This is mentioned because the images there are royalty-free, so there is no risk of copyright infringement.

resources.string: Es isch sicher, Bilder vu folgende Website z\'verwände:
Wähl d\'Theme vu dim Post us
Du chasch auch sälber g\'machti- oder knipsti Bilder verwände oder Screenshots vu Lichess... eifach alles, was nöd vu öpper anderem urheberrächtlich gschützt isch.
Bitte nur sicheri und reschpäktvolli Inhält poschte. Kopier nöd Inhält vu öpper anderem.
Irgendwelchi unagmässeni Inhält, chönd zur Schlüssig vu dim Konto fühere.

string.name: blogTips
string.comment:
blogTips
This is a link to https://lichess.org/page/blog-tips. Appears when creating a new post.

resources.string: Euseri simple Ratschläg, zum tolli Biträg poschte
